meanings.definition: To believe or suppose to be guilty, true, or likely
meanings.sent1: I am suspecting that my brother ate the last cookie.
meanings.sent2: She is always suspecting others of wrongdoing.
meanings.sent3: I was suspecting the cat of plotting against me.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds in the sky made me suspecting a storm was coming.
meanings.sent5: The detective was suspecting the butler in the murder mystery.

meanings.definition: To have doubts or suspicions about someone or something
meanings.sent1: He is suspecting that the new student is not who they claim to be.
meanings.sent2: After finding the door unlocked, she started suspecting a break-in.
meanings.sent3: I am suspecting that the dog is secretly a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The old house creaked, making me suspecting ghosts were present.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was suspecting cheating during the exam.
